articles.title: Hair loss treatment: The best breakfast to encourage hair growth - Express
articles.description: HAIR LOSS is influenced by age, health, genetics and diet. You may not have control over all of these factors, but you most definitely can dictate your diet. Choosing a good breakfast could encourage hair growth.

articles.author: Jessica Knibbs
articles.title: High blood pressure: The four unusual signs found in your feet warning of hypertension - Express
articles.description: HIGH blood pressure or hypertension affects roughly 25 percent of the world's population. Experiencing any of these four signs in your feet could mean you're at risk of hypertension.
